attributes.action: Find and protect missing and trafficked children by collecting and recording the DNA of every child in the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We also request that he recommends this to the other countries of the EEC. We believe that this DNA Database would identify kidnapped children who have been trafficked and help return them to their families even when they have no recollection of their true identity. We would like a Government Department devoted to helping these lost children. This is a matter of great urgency and importance.
